item.title: Common Markdown Syntax
item.description: Markdown is a simple and easy-to-use markup language for creating formatted text using a plain-text editor. Headings # There are 6 level heading options. # Heading level 1 ## Heading level 2 ### Heading level 3 #### Heading level 4 ##### Heading level 5 ###### Heading level 6 Output: There is a space between # and the heading name.
